RISK_V_ADJUSTED_EXCHANGE_RATES.author: Author A
RISK_V_ADJUSTED_EXCHANGE_RATES.description: To get the end of day exchange rates
RISK_V_ADJUSTED_EXCHANGE_RATES.comments: - Always uses the currency from the previous day as the current day is not available or MAX date.

regression_test_config.where_query: trandat in (select distinct trandat from table order by trandat desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

columns.comments: Import time when the record has been inserted

RISK_V_ALL_POS_DELIVERY_OPEN.author: Author A
RISK_V_ALL_POS_DELIVERY_OPEN.description: This is an outdated view and not used anymore.
RISK_V_ALL_POS_DELIVERY_OPEN.comments: Shows the the snapshot of the positions and no more details.

RISK_V_AUCTION_CALENDAR.author: Author F
RISK_V_AUCTION_CALENDAR.comments: Use the view to get the auction days

columns.comments: Date and Year for which the limit definition has its auction day.
The product to which the Limit Definition belongs.

RISK_V_BOM_CASCADING_DATA.author: Author E
RISK_V_BOM_CASCADING_DATA.description: Provide some Data from the Website
RISK_V_BOM_CASCADING_DATA.comments: - Used for an Implementation to get the remaining_contract_size

regression_test_config.where_query: fact_date in (select distinct fact_date from table.data order by fact_date desc fetch first 3 rows only)

RISK_V_CLEARER_CHANGE.author: Author A
RISK_V_CLEARER_CHANGE.description: Provide CM-NCM-relation using the hist table

RISK_V_CLOSEOUT_CALC.author: Author A
RISK_V_CLOSEOUT_CALC.description: Performs Closeout Monitoring for all physically settled products
RISK_V_CLOSEOUT_CALC.comments: - No input required. Runs closeout on positions for latest fact_date.

RISK_V_CONTRACT_DETAILS.author: Author B
RISK_V_CONTRACT_DETAILS.description: Provide relevant contract data for Stresstest application
RISK_V_CONTRACT_DETAILS.comments: - Fact_date required as input - Provides data that can be defined on contract level which is defined by product code, expiry year and expiry month - For futures 'contract' is the same as 'instrument' - For options 'contract' does *not* include call put flag and exercise price - The source table contains data on instrument level, thus option contract data would be duplicated if not filtered, because it is the same for each combination of call put flag and exercise price. In order to deduplicate, we partition by primary key and sort by call_put_flag and exercise_price. Finally we take the first one we find for each primary key.

regression_test_config.where_query: fact_date >= trunc(sysdate-1)

RISK_V_DEPRECATED_MARKTVALUES_MR.author: Author A
RISK_V_DEPRECATED_MARKTVALUES_MR.description: This is a deprecated view. Combines CurrenyRates, Auction Prices and Settlement Prices.
RISK_V_DEPRECATED_MARKTVALUES_MR.comments: - Since it is an MR view, shows the most recent only

RISK_V_DMS_BALANCES.author: Author A
RISK_V_DMS_BALANCES.comments: - This view gave errors with DAL_REF_DAILY_BALANCES_OFFSET in the schema DAL_IDP_O - This view removes dependency on the DAL_IDP_O.DAL_REF_DAILY_BALANCES_OFFSET

regression_test_config.where_query: day in (select distinct day from dal_risk_o.risk_v_dms_balances where day < trunc(sysdate) order by day desc fetch  first 6 rows only)

RISK_V_DMS_DAILY_BALANCES.author: Author A
RISK_V_DMS_DAILY_BALANCES.description: To get daily balances for delivery accounts This view doesnt have any dependency on DAL_IDP_O.DAL_REF_DAILY_BALANCES_OFFSET anymore, instead it uses data from DAL_RISK_O.DAL_SMSS_DMS_DAILY_BALANCES itself

regression_test_config.where_query: bookkeeping_date in (select distinct bookkeeping_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_dms_daily_balances where bookkeeping_date < trunc(sysdate) order by bookkeeping_date desc fetch  first 6 rows only)
start_handel > sysdate -360 and ende_handel < sysdate + 360
system = 'EUREX'
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_daily_cash_account_cm order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_daily_margin order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

RISK_V_EOD_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.author: Author A
RISK_V_EOD_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.description: Converts all values to hard-coded EUR (MMS requirement)
RISK_V_EOD_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.comments: - Must ALWAYS be used together with a date (since it contains the whole history) - but converts all to EUR - converts all M%, G% P% Accounts to PP (MMS requirement)

regression_test_config.where_query: rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from DAL_RISK_O.risk_v_eod_daily_margin_eur order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_daily_settl_surplus order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_margin_summary order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_position_detail rpt_date where  rpt_date > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_secu_collateral order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

RISK_V_EOD_SETTL_PRICES_OI.author: Author A
RISK_V_EOD_SETTL_PRICES_OI.description: provides settlement prices from MDH for all products (to replace the inside market usage)
RISK_V_EOD_SETTL_PRICES_OI.comments: - MUST always be used with a date - As it one view for options and derivatives, so PRODUCT_LINE can be used to distinguish (F, O, S) - uses always the latest snapshot for the day - IMPORTENT!!! Filter on INST_SETUP_COMPLETE = 1 to get only correct setup products

regression_test_config.where_query: trddat in (select distinct trddat from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_EOD_SETTL_PRICES_OI ESPO_date where trddat > trunc(sysdate -14) order by trddat desc fetch  first 2 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_eod_vmar_overall_sum where rpt_date > trunc(sysdate -14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

RISK_V_INSTRUMENTS.author: Author A
RISK_V_INSTRUMENTS.comments: Fact_date required as input - Provides all instrument details - for Risk you should filter on 'C7' - ensure to take the last delivery for a day

regression_test_config.where_query: fact_date in (select distinct fact_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_instruments order by fact_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN.author: Steffen Kohla (RiskDev)
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN.description: Provide Most recent data for DAL_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN aka CI750
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN.comments: - run as is - The source is intraday facttable - it contains several snaphsot a day (identified by RPT_TIME) - we only need the latest RPT_TIME - to speed up the query, a with statement is used, collection the last day (fact_date) once

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_ALL.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_ALL.comments: - aka CI750 - Must ALWAYS be used together with a date (since it contains the whole history) - pick a shapshot (it containsall shapshotfor the day) - contains all values + euro conversion

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_ALL where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.description: Converts all values to hard-coded EUR (MMS requirement)
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR.comments: - aka CI750 - converts all to EUR - converts all M%, G% P% Accounts to PP (MMS requirement. I found occurances) - it contains multiple snapshot for a day, so select one using RPT_TIME

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_EUR where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_SUM.author: Steffen Kohla (RiskDev)
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_SUM.description: Provide Most recent data for DAL_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_SUM aka CI760
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_MARGIN_SUM.comments: - run as is - The source is intraday facttable - it contains several snaphsot a day (identified by RPT_TIME) - we only need the latest RPT_TIME - to speed up the query, a with statement is used, collection the last day (fact_date) once

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT.author: Steffen Kohla (RiskDev)
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT.description: Provide Most recent data for DAL_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT aka CI042
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT.comments: - run as is - The source is intraday facttable - it contains several snaphsot a day (identified by RPT_TIME) - we only need the latest RPT_TIME, but where it matches DAL_INTRA_VAR_PREM - to speed up the query, a with statement is used, collection the last day (fact_date) once

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_ALL.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_ALL.description: provides all values and covert to EUR aka. CI042
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_ALL.comments: - Must ALWAYS be used together with a date (since it contains the whole history) - pick a shapshot (it containsall shapshotfor the day) - contains all values + euro conversion

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_ALL where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_EUR.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_EUR.description: Converts all values to hard-coded EUR (MMS requirement) aka CI042
RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_EUR.comments: - converts all to EUR - it contains multiple snapshots for a day, so SELECT one using RPT_TIME

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT_EUR where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_MATCH_SETTL_2_VARPREM.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_MATCH_SETTL_2_VARPREM.description: Get the rpt_time where we have entry in DAL_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT AND DAL_INTRA_VAR_PREM
RISK_V_INTRA_MATCH_SETTL_2_VARPREM.comments: - ALWAYS provide a FACT_DATE, otherwise it will run for ages.

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE between trunc(sysdate-7) and trunc(sysdate-1)

RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_ALL.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_ALL.description: provides all values and covert to  EUR
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_ALL.comments: - Must ALWAYS be used together with a date (since it contains the whole history) - pick a shapshot (it containsall shapshotfor the day) - contains all values + euro conversion

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_ALL where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) and RPT_DATE > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 1 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '094000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '184000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR.description: Converts all values to hard-coded EUR (MMS requirement)
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR.comments: - CI420 (CI012) - converts all values to EUR - it contains multiple snapshot for a day, so select one using RPT_TIME - converts all M%, G% P% Accounts to PP (MMS requirement. I found occurances)

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) and RPT_DATE > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 1 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '094000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '184000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR_NOEOD.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR_NOEOD.description: Sums up all current positions per member, account AND product
RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR_NOEOD.comments: Usage: - CI420 (CI012) - Since it is a MR view, shows you the most recent only - but filter all EoD Transactions 'END' , '104' , '116' , '126' - This view is a 1:1 replacement of the LZDB version - This view does not show valid values for option, since it does NOT consider the exercise price to the call/put flag. Since this behavior was also present in the original view, I did not fix it.

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_POSITION_DETAIL_EUR_NOEOD where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) and RPT_DATE > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 1 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '094000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '184000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_POS_DETAIL_SUM_MR.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_POS_DETAIL_SUM_MR.description: Sums up all current positions per member, account AND product
RISK_V_INTRA_POS_DETAIL_SUM_MR.comments: - CI420 (CI012) - Since it is an MR view, shows you the most recent only - This view is a 1:1 replacement of the LZDB version - This view does not show valid values for option, since it does NOT consider the exercise price to the call/put flag. Since this behavior was also present in the original view, I did not fix it.

RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11.author: Steffen Kohla (RiskDev)
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11.description: Provide Most recent data for DAL_INTRA_VAR_PREM aka CI140
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11.comments: run as is - The source is intraday facttable - it contains several snaphsot a day (identified by RPT_TIME) - we only need the latest RPT_TIME, but where it matches DAL_INTRA_DAILY_SETTLEMENT - to speed up the query, a with statement is used, collection the last day (fact_date) once

RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_ALL.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_ALL.description: provides all values and coverion to EUR aka CI140
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_ALL.comments: Must ALWAYS be used together with a date (since it contains the whole history) - pick a shapshot (it containsall shapshotfor the day) - contains all values + euro conversion

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_ALL where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) and RPT_DATE > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_EUR.author: Author A
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_EUR.description: Converts all values to hard-coded EUR (MMS requirement) aka CI140
RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_EUR.comments: - converts all values to EUR - it contains multiple snapshots for a day, so select one using RPT_TIME - and converts all M%, G% P% Accounts to PP (MMS requirement. I could not find any occurance).

regression_test_config.where_query: RPT_DATE in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.RISK_V_INTRA_VAR_PREM_E11_EUR where RPT_DATE < trunc (sysdate) and RPT_DATE > trunc (sysdate-14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 2 rows only) and ((RPT_TIME > '080000' and RPT_TIME < '100000') or (RPT_TIME > '130000' and RPT_TIME < '150000') or (RPT_TIME > '170000' and RPT_TIME < '190000'))

RISK_V_LATEST_FCT_LOAD_STATUS.author: Author A
RISK_V_LATEST_FCT_LOAD_STATUS.description: Shows latest techncial update and lastest busiess fact for used Risk tables
RISK_V_LATEST_FCT_LOAD_STATUS.comments: - run as is, it's most recent - 01.01.1970 is default - add lastets entries from load_status - add lastets date for load_status - BDWH-12280

regression_test_config.where_query: rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_position where rpt_date > trunc(sysdate -14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
rpt_date in  (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_series_contracts order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 3 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_series_products where rpt_date > trunc(sysdate -14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)
fact_date = (select max(fact_date) from dal_risk_o.risk_v_settlement_instruction where fact_date < to_date(sysdate)) order by timestamp, recordid fetch  first 200000 rows only

RISK_V_SETTLEMENT_PRICE.author: Author A
RISK_V_SETTLEMENT_PRICE.description: provides settlement prices from MDH for all products
RISK_V_SETTLEMENT_PRICE.comments: - MUST always be used with a date - Contains the unapproved and approved prices (so filter by PRICE_APPROVED = 1 for approved) - But only one unapproved and approved prices (the lastest of it), there are days, when we get more than one

regression_test_config.where_query: fact_date in (select fact_date FROM dal_risk_o.risk_v_settlement_price  where fact_date > sysdate -7  group by fact_date order by fact_date desc  fetch  first 2 rows only)
rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_settlement_price_status order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 3 rows only)
initiatedat < trunc(sysdate) order by initiatedat desc fetch  first 10000 rows only

RISK_V_SMSS_SI_ALLV_CERT.author: BDWH Team and Christoph Hackel
RISK_V_SMSS_SI_ALLV_CERT.description: This view was created to support analysis for the certificate margin.
RISK_V_SMSS_SI_ALLV_CERT.comments: This is NOT an IT managed view and thus must not be used for productive purposes.

regression_test_config.where_query: timestamp_cet > to_date(sysdate) - 10 order by timestamp_cet desc, id

columns.comments: LAST_ITS is a CET timestamp representing the time point of BDWH DAL processing
LAST_UPDATE_TIME is a UTC timestamp representing SETTLEMENT_TIMESTAMP of the source system MDH

RISK_V_TRADE_CONFIRMATION.author: Author A
RISK_V_TRADE_CONFIRMATION.comments: - This view provides you with the Trades, as delivered from C7 (based on positions) - No intraday update - It can be used SoD the next day (The Position gets delivered EoD, but the link account statement SoD) - Fact_date required as input

regression_test_config.where_query: rpt_date in (select distinct rpt_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_trade_confirmation where rpt_date > trunc(sysdate -14) order by rpt_date desc fetch  first 5 rows only)

RISK_V_TRADE_STATISTICS.author: Author A
RISK_V_TRADE_STATISTICS.comments: - run with Fact_date - takes daily instuments source 'C7' - add DAL_TRADE_STATISTICS (open low prices) - add previosSettlement price - add OI - add current settlement price - add underlyings

regression_test_config.where_query: rpt_date = trunc(sysdate-1)
import_date in (select distinct import_date from dal_risk_o.risk_v_virtual_option_strike  where import_date > trunc(sysdate-14) order by import_date desc fetch  first 7 rows only)

RISK_V_VIRTUAL_OPTION_STRIKE_MR.author: Author A
RISK_V_VIRTUAL_OPTION_STRIKE_MR.description: Provide Most recent data of virtual option strikes
RISK_V_VIRTUAL_OPTION_STRIKE_MR.comments: - run as is - contains most recent data per contract - Query rawdata, but member final and call option only - shows lastest data per contract
